CustomField.description: Enter the number of days from the Donation Date that the Data Importer should consider when looking for a matching Opportunity or Payment. The Data Importer will choose the matching Opportunity or Payment whose date falls within the number of days AND is closest to the Donation Date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the number of days from the Donation Date to consider when looking for a matching Opportunity or Payment. The Data Importer will choose the matching Opp or Payment whose date falls within the number of days AND is closest to the Donation Date.
CustomField.label: Number of Days from Donation Date
